Class JokerRule

  • java.lang.Object
    • uk.ac.aber.dcs.cs12320.cards.game.RuleSet
      • uk.ac.aber.dcs.cs12320.cards.game.JokerRule

  • class JokerRule
extends RuleSet

    • Field Summary

      • Fields inherited from class uk.ac.aber.dcs.cs12320.cards.game.RuleSet

        amalgamateAdjacent, amalgamateDistance, incJoker, isShuffled, numOfDecks, ruleName

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      JokerRule()
      Constructor for the JokerRule Sets up the normal ruleset so that one shuffled deck with jokers is used, Distance between piles is set to 2, and amalgamating adjacent piles is allowed.

      • Methods inherited from class uk.ac.aber.dcs.cs12320.cards.game.RuleSet
